short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy / Paste cookie values to / from clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to copy and paste cookie values between tabs. It's particularly useful during front-end development when local development requires using test server cookies to communicate with the test server backend.
